word_mean: 进行性的：向前的，更加恶化的，范围或严重程度均增加的

sentence.Network_cn: 这种疾病的一个显著症状就是记忆逐渐丧失。

sentence.Network_cn: 这些缺点抵消了他在其他方面对待员工还算开明的态度。

sentence.Network_en: a progressive reduction in the size of the workforce

means.word_mean: 前进的,发展的,完善中的

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French progressif, -ive or medieval Latin progressivus, from progress- 'gone forward', from the verb progredi (see progress)

encyclopedia.content: 电子音乐progressive progressive：是电子音乐的一种，此类音乐过度机械化以致于难以归类在一般性的HOUSE乐拍之下，但又不像TRANCE和TECHNO HOUSE的风格那么重和晦暗。其特点是TRANCE风格的键盘和电子合成乐器的处理、HOUSE风格的唱腔、令人亢奋的电子中板的HOUSE节奏。 Progressive House：这类House没啥灵魂唱腔，反而比较注重旋律和乐曲编排。有一 点像"演奏类"的House乐，不过这类曲风定义很广。像SASH!的专辑It's

entry.def: Someone who is progressive or has progressive ideas has modern ideas about how things should be done, rather than traditional ones.

example.ex: ...a progressive businessman who had voted for Roosevelt in 1932 and 1936...
example.tran: 在1932年和1936年投票支持罗斯福的开明商人

example.ex: Willan was able to point to the progressive changes he had already introduced...
example.tran: 维兰能够找出他已经采用的一些革新。

entry.tran: （变化等）逐渐的，逐步发生的，逐步发展的
entry.def: A progressive change happens gradually over a period of time.

example.ex: One prominent symptom of the disease is progressive loss of memory.
example.tran: 这种疾病的一个显著症状就是记忆逐渐丧失。

example.ex: ...the progressive development of a common foreign and security policy.
example.tran: 共同外交与安全政策的逐步发展

entry.def: In grammar, progressive means the same as continuous.

means.word_mean: 1. a tense of verbs used in describing action that is on-going
2. a person who favors a political philosophy of progress and reform and the protection of civil liberties
2. favoring or promoting reform (often by government action)
3. (of taxes) adjusted so that the rate increases as the amount increases

auth_sentence.content: How picky can a "progressive liberal" be!

auth_sentence.res_content_con: How picky can a "progressive liberal" be!

auth_sentence.content: There is a progressive movement in the United States.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is a progressive movement in the United States.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is a progressive movement in the United States.

auth_sentence.content: In such areas his progressive instincts found considerable scope.
auth_sentence.res_content: In such areas his progressive instincts found considerable scope.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In such areas his progressive instincts found considerable scope.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 侵略的,好斗的,有进取心的,敢作敢为的
stems_affixes.word_buile: aggress[v.侵略,进攻]+ive……的→adj.侵略的,好斗的,有进取心的,敢作敢为的
progress[n.进步]+ive……的→adj.进步的,先进的;前进的
ag再+gress走+ion表名词→一再往前走→进攻

stems_affixes.value_cn: [代表]大会;[美国等国的]国会,议会
stems_affixes.word_buile: con一起+gress行走,步→走到一起→代表大会
de分开+gree=gress行走,步→分开走→级别→程度,度数

stems_affixes.value_cn: 离题, 脱轨, 扯到枝节上
stems_affixes.word_buile: digress[v.离题]+ion表名词→n.离题, 脱轨, 扯到枝节上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 违反, 犯罪, [地]海侵, 海进
stems_affixes.word_buile: transgress[v.冒犯;违背]+ion表名词→n.违反, 犯罪, [地]海侵, 海进

means.word_mean: 不断前进的, 有进展的, 逐渐上升的

sentences.en: This is a progressive course in English study.
sentences.cn: 这是英语学习的渐进课程。

sentences.en: It was a progressive disease and he would suffer more and more.
sentences.cn: 病情逐渐加剧, 他将忍受越来越大的痛苦。

sentences.en: This is a progressive firm that uses the most modern systems.
sentences.cn: 这是一家使用非常现代化系统的先进企业。
许多年轻的政治家是进步的。

jushi.english: They were progressive elements at that time.
This is a progressive course in English study.
jushi.chinese: 这是英语学习的渐进课程。
